snippet: Adrian Busby was sentenced to serve a year and a day for making false statements about a confidential source with whom he had an intimate relationship.
abstract: Adrian Busby, former Federal Bureau of Investigation Agent convicted of making false statements about a confidential source with whom he had an intimate relationship, is sentenced to a year and a day in prison.
lead_paragraph: Adrian Busby was sentenced to serve a year and a day for making false statements about a confidential source with whom he had an intimate relationship.

headline.seo: Ex-F.B.I. Agent Sentenced to Prison for Lying
headline.main: Ex-F.B.I. Agent Gets Prison for Denials About Lover
headline.print_headline: Ex-F.B.I. Agent Gets Prison For Denials About His Lover
